app_descript:
App Name: Pull the Pin

Brief: Engage in a brain-teasing journey with 'Pull the Pin,' a puzzle game that tests your strategic thinking and timing skills. With the simple objective of getting all balls into the pipe, players must figure out the optimal order to remove the pins, tackling the force of gravity and various obstacles. Additionally, colorless balls add a layer of complexity as they require coloring before reaching their destination, creating a blend of simplicity and mental trickery that provides endless entertainment.
